metadata.Description: Minerals that are essential for various industries and have a high economic and strategic value.

critical minerals.Description: Critical minerals are implemented in the Energy Efficiency Policy to ensure the use of sustainable and efficient energy resources.
Critical minerals are funded for research and development to explore their potential in sustainable energy solutions.
Critical minerals play a crucial role in the focus on developing and advancing renewable energy technologies.
Critical minerals are used in battery manufacturing for energy storage solutions.
Critical minerals partner with mining companies to ensure responsible and sustainable extraction practices.
Critical minerals contribute to the clean energy transition by enabling the development of renewable energy technologies.
Critical minerals are monitored throughout the supply chain to ensure ethical sourcing and sustainable practices.
Critical minerals are targeted for reducing dependency on fossil fuels and promoting sustainable energy sources.
